title: Corpsegrinder
content:
Corpsegrinder Rare 5~18 Damage 2d6+2Bludgeoning+ 1d4Thunder Weapon Enchantment +2 Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Reliable and trustworthy, you could not hope for more respectable company than this maul whilst traversing the forlorn places of the world. MaulTwo-Handed 4.5 190

2d6+2Bludgeoning+ 1d4Thunder

Weapon Enchantment +2

Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning dam
